subject: Excited to apply for Lead Jobs Developer at your organization
email:
Dear Ethan,

I came across your profile on LinkedIn and was impressed by your experience in software development. With over 2 years of experience in leading jobs development, I believe you would be a great fit for our team at AtliQ.

We're currently looking for a skilled software developer to help us create a new feature for our remote job platform. As a Lead Jobs Developer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing a new mode for our platform that allows users to view lead jobs. If you have experience with software development and are interested in working on a challenging project, we want to hear from you!

I'd love to see some examples of your work. You can find my portfolio links below for reference:

- https://example.com/ml-python-portfolio (check out my machine learning projects with Python)
- https://example.com/ml-python-portfolio (another example of my Python skills)
- https://example.com/devops-portfolio (take a look at my DevOps experience)
- https://example.com/devops-portfolio (more examples of my DevOps work)
- https://example.com/xamarin-portfolio (check out my Xamarin projects)
- https://example.com/xamarin-portfolio (another example of my Xamarin skills)

If you're interested in learning more about this opportunity, I'd be happy to set up a call to discuss further. Please let me know if you're available to talk this week.

Best regards,
Mohan

subject: Excited to apply for Job Title at your organization
email:
Dear Ethan,

I came across your profile and was impressed by your passion for web development. AtliQ is a dynamic company that's always looking for talented individuals to join our team. We're currently seeking a web developer to create and maintain our website's frontend, and I think you might be the perfect fit.

As a web developer at AtliQ, you'll have the opportunity to work on exciting projects and collaborate with a team of experienced professionals. Your primary responsibilities will include writing clean, efficient code in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as ensuring our website's frontend is visually appealing and user-friendly.

If you're passionate about web development and have a keen eye for detail, we'd love to hear from you. Please take a look at our portfolio to get a better understanding of our work: https://example.com/wordpress-portfolio, https://example.com/wordpress-portfolio, https://example.com/wordpress-portfolio, https://example.com/wordpress-portfolio, https://example.com/full-stack-js-portfolio, https://example.com/full-stack-js-portfolio.

We're open to candidates with varying levels of experience, and we're more interested in your skills and attitude than your resume. If you're interested in learning more about this opportunity, I'd be happy to set up a call to discuss further.

Best regards,
Mohan
